CHOOSE_CONNECTION:
Choose your connection 
- 'r' for RMI 
- 's' for Socket 
- 'd' for Default
INSERT_NAME_AGAIN: Please insert your user Name again
NO_SERVER_LISTENING:
No server listening on given ip.
 Please insert new one
SAME_PLAYER_MSG: An user with the same name already logged
GAME_WILL_START: Game will start when enough players are connected
WINDOW_CARD_SELECTED: These are the window cards selected for you:
MENU_WAITING_MESSAGE: You are waiting, what you want to do:
ANOTHER_WINDOW_CARD_MESSAGE: - see window card of another player
ASK_USER: Insert the name of the user whom you want to see the window card between these:
FAVOR_POINT_MESSAGE: - see how many favor points you have left
MENU_PLAYING:
What move do you want to make: 
 p - place a dice from the draft 
 t - use a tool card 
 q - pass turn
ALREADY_DONE: You have already done this action
